metadata.title: CVE-2023-6871 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Under certain conditions, Firefox did not display a warning when a userattempted to navigate to a new protocol handler. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 121.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
